Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Good day, will it be possible to receive an invoice from you after payment by card?
Good day! Yes, it is possible to receive an invoice after making a payment by card. If you need further assistance with this, please let me know!
Hi! Is there a possibility to receive an invoice from you so that I can pay it via wire? I see that in account only offers payment by card, which is a problem for me.

Hi! We do offer the option to pay via wire transfer, especially for international advertisers who may not have a credit card. Please send an email to adsupport@newsbreak.com with your request, and our team will provide you with the necessary details for the wire transfer. Let me know if you need any further assistance!
Hi. We're having trouble figuring out how to make a payment with a card. We've linked the card already.

Hi there! No worries, I can help you with that. To make a payment with your linked card, follow these steps:
1. Access the Billing Section in your account.
2. Click on 'Add payment method' if you haven't already added your card.
3. Provide your credit card information and save it.
4. Once your card is saved, you can proceed to make payments using it.
If you need more detailed instructions, you can refer to our Billing Guide here: [Billing Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17821681919757-Billing-Guide).
Let me know if you have any other questions!
